pageTitle: LensRentals.com - Rent a Novoflex VR-II Panorama System
textBeforeTable: Include Lenscap+ in Price Include Lenscap in Price No Insurance LensRentals.com offers rentals ranging in length from 1 to 90 days. The shopping cart will automatically update the quoted price as you adjust the length of your rental. Our most common rental periods are shown below: Manual Links Bubble level Q-PL-Vertical L-bracket Panorama=Q base Castel-Q focus rail Please Note: It’s necessary to position your camera so that the axis of rotation passes through the nodal point of your lens (instructional manual on CD included). Recommended for this system are wide-angle lenses with a minimum 10 mm focal length, up to telephotos at 135 mm. The software included is a tad bit dated, as there are many programs out there that will perform panoramic stitching that are more user friendly (Photoshop). This software WILL NOT work with an Apple computer. Make sure you have the necessary software if you are using a Mac. This system includes a panorama base (Panorama=Q), a focusing rack (Castel-Q), an L-bracket, a spirit level for flash shoe, PanoramaStudio software, and a manual on CD. It does NOT include a ballhead or tripod, which will
